authors.author: Alexis F. Lvov Henry F. Chorley John Ellerton

verse.name: v1
verse.lines: God the Omnipotent! newline King who ordainest thunder Thy clarion, newline The lightning Thy sword, newline Show forth Thy pity newline On high where Thou reignest, newline Give to us peace in our time, O Lord.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: God the All-merciful! newline Earth hath forsaken, newline Meekness and mercy and slighted Thy word, newline Let not Thy wrath in its terrors awaken, newline Give to us peace in our time, O Lord.

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: God the All-righteous One! newline Man hath defied Thee, newline Yet to eternity standeth Thy word, newline Falsehood and wrong shall not tarry beside Thee, newline Give to us peace in our time, O Lord.

verse.name: v4
verse.lines: So shall Thy people, with thankful devotion, newline Praise Him who saved them from peril and sword; newline Singing in chorus from ocean to ocean, newline Peace to the nations, and praise to the Lord. newline Amen.
